member.name: T:Data.ITimeSeriesInput
member.summary: Interface for timeseries inputs.

member.name: P:Data.ITimeSeriesInput.Source
member.summary: REQUIRED: Data source of the timeseries.

member.name: P:Data.ITimeSeriesInput.DateTimeSpan
member.summary: REQUIRED: Contains a start date and end date for the timeseries request.

member.name: P:Data.ITimeSeriesInput.Geometry
member.summary: REQUIRED: Contains the point, latitude/longitude, for the timeseries request. Metadata may be provided for the geometry.

member.name: P:Data.ITimeSeriesInput.DataValueFormat
member.summary: OPTIONAL: Specifies the output format for the data values in the timeseries. DEFAULT: Format Reference: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/kfsatb94(v=vs.110).aspx

member.name: P:Data.ITimeSeriesInput.TemporalResolution
member.summary: OPTIONAL: The temporal resolution of the time series to be returned. Valid options dependent on the dataset and source of the timeseries. DEFAULT: "default" VALUES: "default", "hourly", "3hourly", "6hourly", "12hourly", "daily", "weekly", "monthly"

member.name: P:Data.ITimeSeriesInput.TimeLocalized
member.summary: OPTIONAL: Indicates if the timezone of the geometry is used for the date/time values of the timeseries. DEFAULT: True

member.name: P:Data.ITimeSeriesInput.Units
member.summary: OPTIONAL: Unit system of the output values. DEFAULT: "metric" VALUES: "metric", "imperial"

member.name: P:Data.ITimeSeriesInput.OutputFormat
member.summary: OPTIONAL: Specifies output format type. DEFAULT: "json" VALUES: "json", "xml", "csv"
